help:
This file holds the configurable components of FOCUSA, aiming towards better flexibility and modularity. 
 Here you will find the knobs that can be tuned to customise FOCUSA for your purpose.
Kindly do not modify the default values in this file unless necessary.
author: @yashdiniz

auth.help: 'type' could either be empty, or have the value 'OAuth2'
If OAuth2 is used, the password field below can be left empty.
auth.clientSecret: type in your secret if you're using OAuth2
